body:
About 40 mins ago I learned my dog passed away of overheation.
He was a pretty good dog.
RIP Samson 2012 - 2014.
body_tagged:
About 40 mins ago I learned my dog passed away of overheation.
He was a pretty good dog.
RIP Samson 2012 - 2014.
title: Feeling Down

replies.body:
#RIPSamsonHeWasAmazing

Sorry for your loss! Your skin looks like your crying so I hope you feel better! I know how it feels to lose a dog but not one who was only two. I hope you feel better soon!
replies.body_tagged:
#RIPSamsonHeWasAmazing

Sorry for your loss! Your skin looks like your crying so I hope you feel better! I know how it feels to lose a dog but not one who was only two. I hope you feel better soon!

That really stinks.. :c
Everything dies eventually, though; it's ok. 
I'm sure he was really happy and loved you <3

replies.body: So sorry for your loss. May he rest in peace and always be remembered <3

replies.body:
Holy Jesus, I've never heard of a dog dying of heat exhaustion o_o Where do you live?

That really sucks, just stick together with whoever else owned him, make sure you get through it together :)

replies.body: Aw I remember when one of my dog died ;( everyday I would take my bagel and hold it down thinking that one day my dog would just be hiding and come eat the bagel. Sorry for your loss! And sorry if that post was a little selfish
